content:
In the Orikhiv and Kherson directions, Ukrainian defenders destroyed 50 units of weapons and military equipment of the enemy. Among them are 2 tanks and 13 artillery systems.

About it in TelegramreportDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

"The forces of the South Defense are inflicting fire at the locations and firing positions of the enemy," the message reads.

It was obtained that the enemy in the Orikhiv and Kherson directions became less than:

- 141 occupier;

- 50 units of weapons and military equipment, including:

2 tanks;

23 units of auto-bronze;

13 artillery systems;

4 air defense agents;

1 UAV ground control station;

1 reconnaissance UAV;

2 radar stations;

4 Photovodoscass means.

4 more felds of ammunition and a checkpoint were destroyed.

Earlier forces of defenseDestroyedIn the south, two SPA "Arrow-10" and a hostile warehouse with ammunition.
title: In the Orikhiv and Kherson directions of defense force, 13 more enemy artisms were destroyed
description: This was reported in Telegram forces of defense of southern Ukraine. “The forces of the South Defense ...
author: Army Inform
